name: 陳心怡
objective: This course provides an overview of the field of technology and language learning. The course explores prominent theories in language learning and cover issues and problems in the field of computer-assisted language learning and computer-mediated communication. Through discussions, activities and projects, students will not only critically evaluate various digital tools but also develop practical knowledge in designing technology-enhanced materials for language teaching and learning.
scorePolicy:
A total of 100 points will be granted. Your grade will be based on the quality of your work in the following areas. 

1. Participation, exams, and assignments (50%)
2. Discussion leads (20%) 
3. Final project and presentation (30%)

Note: The grade percentage is subject to change. In addition, required assignments that carry no point values must be completed in order for you to receive full credit for the rest of the assignment and the course.
